name: OCKAnyReadOnlyCarePlanStore
desc: A read-only custom store that fetches care plan data objects.

items.name: var carePlanDelegate: OCKCarePlanStoreDelegate?
items.desc: The object that handles callbacks from a care plan store when the contents of the care plan store change.

items.name: func fetchAnyCarePlan(withID: String, callbackQueue: DispatchQueue, completion: OCKResultClosure<OCKAnyCarePlan>)
items.desc: Fetches a care plan asynchronously from the store.

items.name: func fetchAnyCarePlans(query: OCKAnyCarePlanQuery, callbackQueue: DispatchQueue, completion: OCKResultClosure<[OCKAnyCarePlan]>)
items.desc: Fetches an array of care plans asynchronously from the store.
